page.title: 20Further Research and Credits
page.content:
The following{books}provide valuable information for further research: "The Story of Farnham"_ W.E.Newman. "Saxon Farnham"- Elfrida Manning. "Farnham Buildings and People"-Temple. "Victorian Farnham"- Ewbank Smith. "Edwardian Farnham"- Ewbank Smith. "Farnham in War and Peace"- Ew. Smith. "Historic Farnham"(Town Walk)- A.Booth
Details of{current developments}and policies, including the Waverley District Plan, are available from Waverley Borough Council, Council Offices, The Burys, Godalming GU7 1HR.
The information on these pages was collected and recorded by the pupils of{Form 2MF,}Weydon School, Weydon Lane, Farnham. July 1985.
